verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: touted] [ARG1: his efforts to bring the 2026 World Cup to North America] [ARGM-LOC: in a tweet Friday morning] , [ARGM-ADV: thanking supporters and New England Patriots owner Robert Kraft for giving him " excellent advice] . "
